actions.committee: House Committee on Banking anc Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking anc Currency.

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for a temporary extension of the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development with respect to the insurance of loans and mortgages, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for a temporary extension of the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to regulate the insurance of loans and mortgages.

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for a temporary extension of the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development with respect to the insurance of loans and mortgages, and for other purposes.
